text: Ba'ze az ahli kitoʙ hastand, ki ʙa Alloh va on ci ʙar sumo va on ci ʙar onho nozil sudaast, imon dorand va dar ʙaroʙari Alloh furutan hastand va ojoti Allohro ʙa ʙahoi andak namefurusand. Va inho dar haqiqat ahli kitoʙ va ʙarxurdoron az donis va ilm hastand. Podosi onho nazdi Parvardigorason ast. Hamono Alloh zudhisoʙgir ast
